Reference

Sentinel

Query, preview and download Sentinel-1, Sentinel-2 and Sentinel-3 data

getSentinel_query()

Query Sentinel-1, Sentinel-2, Sentinel-3, Sentinel-5P or Sentinel GNSS records

getSentinel_preview()

Preview a Sentinel image

getSentinel_data()

Download Sentinel-1, Sentinel-2, Sentinel-3, Sentinel-5P or Sentinel GNSS data

getSentinel_restore()

Restore Sentinel datasets from Copernicus LTA

Landsat

Query, preview and download Landsat data

getLandsat_names()

Get Landsat product names from USGS Earth Explorer

getLandsat_query()

Query Landsat records

getLandsat_preview()

Preview a Landsat image

getLandsat_data()

Download Landsat data

MODIS

Query, preview and download MODIS data

getMODIS_names()

Get MODIS product names from USGS Earth Explorer

getMODIS_query()

Query MODIS data

getMODIS_preview()

Preview a MOSIS image

getMODIS_data()

Download MODIS data

Preprocessing

Data preparation and preprocessing

extractSentinel()

Extract Sentinel zip archives

prepSentinel()

Prepare Sentinel data to be ready-to-use (beta)

cropFAST()

Crop file to a spatial extent (beta)

Session Login

Define login credentials that can be used throughout the running session

login_CopHub() login_USGS()

Session-wide login

Session Tools

Define settings for the running session and get session information

set_archive() set_aoi() view_aoi() get_aoi() services_avail()

Session-wide settings and checks

General

aoi_data

An example AOI of three different classes

getSpatialData-package

Overview of getSpatialData tools
